Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Prepared \Pre*pared"\, a. Made fit or suitable; adapted; ready; as, prepared food; prepared questions. -- {Pre*par"ed*ly}, adv. --Shak. -- {Pre*par"ed*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]

prepared adj 1: made ready or fit or suitable beforehand; "a prepared statement"; "be prepared for emergencies" [ant: {unprepared}] 2: having made preparations; "prepared to take risks" [syn: {disposed(p)}, {fain}, {inclined(p)}] 3: equipped or prepared with necessary intellectual resources; "graduates well equipped to handle such problems"; "equipped to be a scholar"
